>
[Bullhook](/Equipment.aspx?ID=583)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God](/Sources.aspx?ID=23) pg. 73

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _bullhook_ is a stout rod about 4 feet long with a blunt hook on the end. Too dull to be useful as a weapon, a _bullhook_ is instead used to direct animals in training or in performing their tasks. A _bullhook_ grants you an item bonus to [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) checks to [Command an Animal](/Actions.aspx?ID=58) while you are holding it.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> command, Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You wave the _bullhook_ to produce the effects of a [_command_](/Spells.aspx?ID=45) spell. This spell loses the [linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101) trait and can target only animals.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _command_ of the appropriate level.
